name: Root Of Evil (GlobalGameJam 2023 Game)
description:
The Root of All Evil is a game about a sprout just trying to find his way to some water. Move with the arrow keys towards the water, and if you're ever stuck, reset by pressing the "R" key.

Programmers: Joshua Orsino, Matthew Medina, Thomas C, Alex, Anthony Lozzo
Art: Gabriel Schaerf
Music: Megan Wolanski
Initial Concept: Colin Andrews, Samuel D'Ambra
